organizations: Organisation for Security and Co-operation in Europe

relationships.description: Epstein employed Visoki as his private pilot
Prince Andrew was Epstein's shooting companion
Edwards is attorney for women suing Epstein
Madoff convicted of hedge fund fraud

transactions: Epstein transferred Ferrari title deeds to pilot Larry Visoki

analysis.purpose: To report on various business and financial news items with investigative angles
analysis.significance: Reveals connections between Jeffrey Epstein and high-profile individuals, and provides details about his legal situation and financial transactions

concerns: Epstein's criminal conviction for soliciting prostitution and procuring a minor
Civil claims against Epstein for unlawful sex with young women

notable_quotes: "Visoki admitted Bill Clinton, Prince Andrew, former Israeli prime minister Ehud Barak, former Colombian president Andrés Pastrana Arango, Obama economic adviser Lawrence Summers, billionaire Ron Burkle, and actors Kevin Spacey and Chris Tucker had been on board the plane while young girls were present."
"Fortuitously for Epstein, however, Ferrari-selling Visoki swore on oath that he never suspected his boss of having sex with them."

"Rumours persist that he pleaded guilty as quickly as he did and said the absolute minimum because he wasn't the main crook of the piece - the main business of his hedge fund was washing money for organised crime."
red_flags: Epstein transferring assets to his pilot prior to legal proceedings
High-profile individuals associated with Epstein despite his criminal record
Pilot's testimony conflicting with known facts about Epstein's activities
Madoff organized crime money laundering allegations

evidence: Madoff allegedly warned by 'friends with Italian-American origins' that his family's lives would be at risk if he didn't 'take the rap'
blackmail_indicators.description: The article suggests Madoff may have been coerced into pleading guilty through threats to his family's safety

illegal_activity.description: This is a news article reporting on past illegal activities of Epstein and Madoff, not first-hand evidence of ongoing criminal activity

details: Article discusses media companies charging for online content
References BBC broadcasts being blocked in Azerbaijan
Mentions Wall Street Journal report on private jet travel

public_knowledge.context: This is a published news article from 2009 covering Epstein's legal cases and high-profile connections, Madoff's fraud case, and various business news items

analysis.summary: This 2009 news article reports on Jeffrey Epstein's legal situation, including his transfer of a Ferrari to his pilot Larry Visoki and deposition testimony revealing high-profile individuals who flew on Epstein's plane with young girls present. The article also covers business news including media subscription models, insolvency predictions, and discusses Bernie Madoff's fraud case with allegations of organized crime connections.
